Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx

Interface SchedulingCompositeMonitor<OUT>

Type Parameters:
OUT - Type of job result data
All Superinterfaces:
SchedulingMonitor<OUT>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SchedulingCompositeMonitorImpl
public interface SchedulingCompositeMonitor<OUT> extends SchedulingMonitor<OUT>
Represents for a delegated monitor that holds multiple scheduling monitors.

Since:
2.0.0
API Note:
The holder keeps only one monitor per java class, if try to register many instances of same class, the holder will keep the last one
